tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    crm_id VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email_address VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_recipients INT,
    total_clicks INT,
    total_conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT,
    crm_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE EmailMarketing (
    email_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    email_subject TEXT,
    email_content TEXT,
    send_date TIMESTAMP,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Analytics (
    analytics_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    marketing_channel TEXT,
    acquisition_rate FLOAT,
    retention_rate FLOAT,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES Customers(customer_id),
    email_id UUID REFERENCES EmailMarketing(email_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(20), address VARCHAR(255), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW());
CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id), order_date DATE, total_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending');
CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, category VARCHAR(50), price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Inactive');
CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_id INT REFERENCES email_campaigns(campaign_id), opens INT, clicks INT, conversions INT, revenue DECIMAL(10,2));
